titleStmt.title: The booke of thrift, containing a perfite order, and right methode to profite lands, and other things belonging to husbandry. ; Newly Englished, and set out by I.B. gentleman of Caen in France.
titleStmt.author: Henley, Walter de, fl. 1250.

titleStmt.title: The booke of thrift, containing a perfite order, and right methode to profite lands, and other things belonging to husbandry. ; Newly Englished, and set out by I.B. gentleman of Caen in France.
titleStmt.author: Henley, Walter de, fl. 1250.
Bellot, Jacques.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Walter de Henley by STC (2nd ed.) and CDNB.
Dedication ascribed by "Iames Bellot Gentleman of Caen in Normandy".
Pages numbered on recto only, with numerous errors in numbering; leaves 25, 26, 27 are numbred 22, 23, 18, respectively.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
